title: BRIEF-Lynas Corporation Says Qtrly Invoiced Sales Revenue Of A$99.1 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Lynas Corporation Says Qtrly Invoiced Sales Revenue Of A$99.1 Mln

Commodities 49 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 15:49)

BRIEF-Lynas Corporation Says Qtrly Invoiced Sales Revenue Of A$99.1 Mln Oct 21 (Reuters) - Lynas Corporation Ltd : * QTRLY INVOICED SALES REVENUE OF A$99.1M VERSUS A$87.5M IN Q4 * QUARTERLY NDPR PRODUCTION 1,242 TONNES VERSUS 1,505 TONNES IN Q4 * QTRLY TOTAL REO PRODUCTION 3,926 TONNES VERSUS Q4 FY19 4,651 TONNES * DURING QUARTER THERE WAS INCREASED INTEREST FROM MAGNET BUYERS IN EUROPE AND US FOR LONG TERM CONTRACTS * US-CHINA TRADE TENSIONS, WHILE LEADING TO GREATER INTEREST IN RARE EARTHS, CONTINUE TO HAVE NEGATIVE SHORT TERM EFFECT ON MARKET CONFIDENCE * QTRLY REO SALES VOLUME 4,186 TONNES VERSUS 4,723 TONNES IN Q4 * ARE MAKING GOOD PROGRESS WITH OUR LYNAS 2025 GROWTH PLANS * "CONTINUED DIFFICULT GLOBAL ECONOMIC CONDITIONS, PARTICULARLY IN CHINA, WEIGHED ON RARE EARTH MARKET PRICES DURING SEPTEMBER QUARTER" * AT LYNAS MALAYSIA, LANTHANIDE CONCENTRATE PRODUCTION RATES HAVE BEEN MANAGED AT REDUCED VOLUMES FOR QUARTER, IN LINE WITH CURRENT APPROVAL * IF APPROVAL IS NOT RECEIVED IN TIME, TOTAL NDPR PRODUCTION FOR CY19 WILL BE SIMILAR TO CY18

BRIEF-Lynas Corporation Says Qtrly Invoiced Sales Revenue Of A$99.1 Mln
description: BRIEF-Lynas Corporation Says Qtrly Invoiced Sales Revenue Of A$99.1 Mln
